name: No Bake Pumpkin Dessert
ingredients: Mix together and bake in a 9 x 13 pan at 350 for 10-12 minutes.
1 Tbsp Knox gelatin dissolved in 1/4 cups cold water.
or in place of the spices 2 tsp pumpkin spice
instructions: Mix together and bring to boil over low heat.
Remove from heat and add gelatin.
Beat egg whites with 1/2 c. cream of tartar and 6 T. sugar.
Fold into mix and pour on crust.
